bottoms.title: Striped Pants with Multicolored Taping
specs: Hand wash in cold water, hang to dry
bottoms.description: Stripe up those legs and get a trendy vibe in these skinny pants with multicolored taping on the sides of the legs.

bottoms.title: Fleece Lined Houndstooth Leggings
specs: Machine wash in cold water, hang to dry
bottoms.description: Keep your love of leggings going on all winter with the cozy, fleece lined design of these stylish houndstooth leggings.

bottoms.title: Chevron Sweater Knit Flippy Skirt
specs: Hand wash in cold water, hang to dry
bottoms.description: The flattering flippy design gives this chevron print, sweater knit skirt a flirty, feminine feel.

bottoms.title: Leggings with Front Tie
specs: Machine wash in cold water, hang to dry
bottoms.description: Your leggings create a much trendier, athleisure outfit with the cool front tie on this design.

bottoms.title: Diamond Skinny Pants with Vertical Zips
specs: Hand wash in cold water, hang to dry
bottoms.description: If diamonds really are your best friend, then flaunt them on these chic pull-on skinny pants, featuring edgy vertical zip detailing.

bottoms.title: Navajo Print Leggings
specs: Machine wash in cold water, hang to dry
bottoms.description: Give your legs some color and get trendy in these cool, navajo print knit leggings.

bottoms.title: Slim Velour Joggers with Side Stripes
specs: Machine wash in cold water, hang to dry
bottoms.description: Be warned that when you slip on these soft, cozy velour joggers with contrast side stripes, you'll be more inclined to cuddle up than go for an actual jog.

bottoms.title: Belted Houndstooth Skinny Knit Pants
specs: Hand wash in cold water, hang to dry
bottoms.description: Class up your bottoms with the chic houndstooth print in these elegant, belted knit skinny pants.

bottoms.title: Slim Velour Joggers with Drawstring
specs: Machine wash in cold water, hang to dry
bottoms.description: Be warned that when you slip on these soft, cozy velour joggers with a convenient drawstring, you'll be more inclined to cuddle up than go for an actual jog.

bottoms.title: Fleece Lined Jogger Leggings
specs: Machine wash in cold water, hang to dry
bottoms.description: The cool look of joggers mixes with the sleek fit of leggings in this comfy, fleece lined design.

bottoms.title: Chevron Fleece Lined Leggings
specs: Machine wash in cold water, hang to dry
bottoms.description: It's never too cold for stylish leggings when you can flaunt this trendy chevron print in a cozy, fleece lined design.

bottoms.title: Ruffled Front Skirt with Back Flounce
specs: Machine wash in cold water, hang to dry
bottoms.description: Show off your sleek side in this chic skirt, but we didn't forget your flirty side, which is why we added a sweet ruffled front and back flounce to the hem. It features a back zip and inside elastic for the perfect fit.

bottoms.title: Polar Fleece Star Print Pajama Pants
specs: Hand wash in cold water, hang to dry
bottoms.description: Who doesn't love getting cuddly? It's now that much easier in these soft and cozy polar fleece pajama pants in a dreamy star print.

bottoms.title: Faux Leather Pencil Skirt with Side Stripes
specs: Hand wash in cold water, hang to dry
bottoms.description: We've taken the best that menswear has to offer to inspire this edgy, faux leather pencil skirt, with trendy side stripes to create a fierce silhouette.

bottoms.title: Chino Pants with Side Taping
specs: Machine wash in cold water, hang to dry
bottoms.description: Your go-to chinos are now that much cooler with the side taping on this trendy design.

bottoms.title: Faux Suede Skinny Pants
specs: Machine wash in cold water, hang to dry
bottoms.description: Get your chic on by simply opting for these classy faux suede skinny pants, with a side zip and inner elastic waistband, instead of your jeans.

bottoms.title: Grid Pattern Brushed Leggings
specs: Machine wash in cold water, hang to dry
bottoms.description: Stray from your solids and mix it up a bit with the chic grid pattern on these trendy, brushed leggings.

bottoms.title: Skinny Jeans with Wide Patterned Belt
specs: Remove belt before machine wash in cold water, hang to dry
bottoms.description: Not only will you love the smooth fit of these skinny jeans, but the wide, patterned belt that comes with them will give your outfit a trendier twist.

bottoms.title: Crepe Joggers with Side Taping and Zip Pockets
specs: Machine wash in cold water, hang to dry
bottoms.description: We love the revival of everything retro, including these cool joggers featuring side taping, wide legs and trendy zip pockets.

bottoms.title: Leopard Print Leggings
specs: Machine wash in cold water, hang to dry
bottoms.description: Why should your tops get all the fun when these hot, leopard print leggings deserve everyone's attention?

bottoms.title: Wide Leg Jeans
specs: Machine wash in cold water, hang to dry
bottoms.description: Nothing beats a classic, wide leg pant for a sleek style that your skinnies can't match. Dress them up with an elegant blouse or get a cooler vibe with a pair of sneakers and a tee.

bottoms.title: Crepe Joggers with Side Stripes
specs: Machine wash in cold water, hang to dry
bottoms.description: We love the revival of everything retro, including these cool joggers featuring bold, red side stripes.

bottoms.title: Pull-on Leggings with Side Stripes
